title: Inventory Management System
description: A tool to show the quantity of items in your inventory and help you manage them.
details: This project uses React to create a 2 page web page.

title: Finanace Manager Application
description: A tool to help users track their spendings and finances.

title: Business Card Generator
description: A generator to create and format business card layouts.
details: Built in Python with Flask and React

title: Word Scrambler
description: Simple word scramble app that generates scrambled text. Can also be used for password security

title: Live Stock Monitoring App
description: A live app that monitors users stocks.
details: Built with Flash, Python, Vue.js and YahooFinanace API

title: Password Manager
description: Can create and store secure passwords without the need of storing them online. Creates and executable that can be run from your desktop.
